basic_information.description: Age, location, and time zone for personalized greetings and time-specific tasks.

preferences.description: Language, communication style, interests, and favorite topics to tailor conversations.

goals_and_priorities.description: Short-term and long-term objectives to align my assistance with user ambitions.

habits_and_routines.description: Information on daily routines to assist with scheduling and reminders.

assistant_expected_role.description: Information about the role that the user expects from the Assistant, includes user expectations
